name: Kakadu Lip Balm
description:
**BACKORDER AVAILABLE FOR DISTRIBUTION IN SEPTEMBER**


A nourishing balm with beeswax, vegetable oils and organic bush extracts of Kakadu Plum and Quandong.

This is our only non vegan product (beeswax), however all ingredients, as with everything else, are organic where possible and of the very highest quality.

Only a small amount is needed to leave your lips silky soft.

15gm tub

name: Australian Bush Natives Toners
description:
Cleanse your face with this beautiful blend of rose water, witchhazel, 100% pure essential rose geranium and Australian bush natives of Quandong and Kakadu Plum. 

I made this originally for myself and it is the best blend I have ever come across. Soothes the most sensitive of skins whilst showing off a fantastic astringent quality. Will leave you feeling fresh as a daisy and looking fabulous!

100ml green glass bottle.

name: Man Hands
description:
Nurture your hands with our delicious creamy hand cream. Organic vegan ingredients with 100% pure essential oils and Australian bush native extracts of Kakadu Plum and Quandong. 

This cream has a deep and manly healing scent with a beautiful blend of chamomile, lavendar, ylang ylang, lemon, bergamot and vetiver oils ready to smooth even the roughest of working hands.

This cream is popular with tradespeople, gardeners, musicians and others with tired, dry and cracked hands.

pricing
100ml tin   	$27.50

name: Lotions & potions
description:
All lotions are made using a rich emollient base 
complimented by beautiful essential oil blends.

All our products are Paraben-free, Sulphate-free; Propylene glycol-free, DEA-free and Artificial colour-free.

All ingredients are sourced from PETA recognised 
suppliers ensuring the highest quality and most 
ethical products are being applied to your skin.

Ingredients: Purified Water, Vegetable Glycerine, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Almond Sweet Oil, Sunflower Oil, Natural Vitamin E,  Macadamia Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Stearic Acid, Ceteareth 20, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Sodium Hydroxide, 100% pure essential oils 

120ml amber glass tubs with black lid
200ml amber glass bottles with black pump
